caption: Relating to prohibiting the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by and contracts or other agreements with certain aliens or foreign entities.
summary: This bill prohibits citizens and entities from China, Iran, North Korea, and Russia from purchasing real property in Texas and entering into contracts with Texas governmental entities. Chinese citizens and companies are specifically impacted unless they are US permanent residents. The bill affects both direct ownership and indirect control through companies. Chinese individuals and entities cannot acquire new properties or enter government contracts after September 1, 2025.
translation: 该法案禁止来自中国、伊朗、朝鲜和俄罗斯的公民和实体在德克萨斯州购买不动产以及与德克萨斯州政府实体签订合同。除非是美国永久居民，否则中国公民和公司将受到特别影响。该法案同时影响直接所有权和通过公司进行的间接控制。2025年9月1日后，中国个人和实体将无法获得新房产或签订政府合同。
